description:
Contour Cube is a revolutionary product designed to make ice facials fuss-free. Harness the power of cryotherapy to give yourself a natural facelift, de-puff eye bags and add radiance to skin.

Once frozen, simply glide onto clean skin for an instant pick-me-up or use in combination with serums or over face masks to accelerate product absorption. Plus, you can customise your ice facial with different ingredients, from rose water (natural primer) to coconut milk (hydration) and more.

Product Size:
10cm x 5cm

Benefits:

  • Contours and lifts the skin 
  • Eliminates under eye puffiness 
  • Reduces inflammation
  • Soothes acne 
  • Reduces dark circles
  • Suited for all skin types

How to use:

  • Simply fill your Contour Cube through the heart shaped hole with water
  • Once frozen use as a non-slip grip to glide the ice over the contours of your face
  • Before applying, run the frozen Contour Cube under water to slightly defrost
  • Use daily in 30 second intervals for no more than 1-2 minutes on each side of your face moving the ice continuously in upwards circular motions
  • You can use the Contour Cube for up to 1 week per refill
  • If you have sensitive skin use our Contour Cloths as a protective barrier between your skin and your frozen Contour Cube
  • Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if signs of irritation appear.

Care:

Wash thoroughly before use. Only ad​​d cold liquids to your Contour Cube.
Product does not come with ice or other ingredients.
name: Contour Cube 1EA
